long_description: Perfect for day hikes or longer trips that take you deep into the backcountry, the Arc'teryx Perimeter pants with 30 in. inseam are built for a range of temperatures and activity levels. Lightweight, quick-drying and flexible nylon/polyurethane fabric offers lots of mobililty to keep you comfortable on city streets and mountain trails. Articulated construction and a gusseted crotch allow comfortable range of motion with no tugging. 2 front hand pockets, 2 rear pockets and a zippered cargo pocket stow your trail and travel items; hand pockets and rear pockets are lined with mesh. The Arc'teryx Perimeter pants have an athletic fit.
